issue.title: Is the leak detector supposed to be this hard to grab?

content.raw:
I just downloaded the file to another computer from this site and it played fine on VLC player in Ubuntu, so I don't know why it is giving you trouble.  Can you try it again?

@[Jeremy White](https://bitbucket.org/knitfoo/) YES.  The table is so low that we are having to do all sorts of machinations with bending and twisting to reach the objects.  And as [Steven](https://bitbucket.org/scpeters/) points out, we have limited control of the joints in the hands.
content.html:
I just downloaded the file to another computer from this site and it played fine on VLC player in Ubuntu, so I don't know why it is giving you trouble. Can you try it again?

@Jeremy White YES. The table is so low that we are having to do all sorts of machinations with bending and twisting to reach the objects. And as Steven points out, we have limited control of the joints in the hands.
